testcase.name: User settings should be aditable on homepage
testcase.system-out: Given user go to GMI userSettings page......................................passed And user enters a valid UspUsername.........................................passed And user enters a valid UspPassword.........................................passed And user clicks on Sign in button..........................................passed And user clicks on username.................................................passed Then clicks on userinfo.....................................................passed

testcase.name: positive1
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on First Name Box.........................................passed And user enters valid Name..................................................passed And user click save button1.................................................passed Then should see Setting saved! message1.....................................passed

testcase.name: positive2
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on Last Name Box..........................................passed And user enters valid Last Name.............................................passed And user click save button2.................................................passed Then should see pop up Settings Saved text2.................................passed

testcase.name: positive3
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on Email Box..............................................passed And user enters valid Email.................................................passed And user clicks save button3................................................passed Then should see pop up Settings Saved text3.................................passed

testcase.name: positive4
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on Dropdown...............................................passed And user sees two options available and select one..........................passed Then user clicks on save button4 and sees pop up text4......................passed
